section.para:
OUCS has been assigned private enterprise number 11023 by IANA. (The full list of assignments is available at
http://www.iana.org/assignments/enterprise-numbers ). This number is used as the base for a hierarchy in the OID (object identifier) space used for SNMP and X.500/LDAP. For more information about object identifiers, see
http://www.alvestrand.no/objectid/ .

This document will be updated when assignments or changes are made in the OUCS OID space; it can be found at
http://staff.oucs.ox.ac.uk/techdocs/ldap/oids.xml
